FuncDef: This command creates a root-to-leaf (S2L) sub-LSP path for the primary instance of a P2MP LSP. The primary instance of a P2MP LSP is modeled as a set of root-to-leaf (S2L) sub-LSPs. The root, for example, head-end node, triggers signaling using one path message per S2L path. The leaf sub-LSP paths are merged at branching points.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the name of the path which consists of up to 32 alphanumeric characters.
Specifies the system IP address of the egress router.
